document.title: WECON Technology Co., Ltd. LeviStudio HMI Editor

revision_history.summary: ICSA-17-285-02 WECON Technology Co., Ltd. LeviStudio HMI Editor

product.name: LEVI Studio HMI Editor: v1.8.1 and prior

notes.text: Multiple stack-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities have been identified in which the application does not verify string size before copying to memory, the attacker may then be able to crash the application or run arbitrary code.CVE-2017-13999 has been assigned to these vulnerabilities. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.5 has been assigned; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: WECON recommends that users update to v1.8.2
